definition: male/Baron, lowest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/CL:個|个[ge4]
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Her inner male counterpart wrote the book on celebrating the body beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 她內心對應的那個男性意向對展現外在美很在行。

sentences.english: Will men participate more in household duties?
sentences.chinese: 男性會更多地參與家務勞動嗎？

sentences.english: In men, low testosterone levels can cause a loss of bone mass.
sentences.chinese: 對於男性來說，睾丸激素低水平會導致骨量的流失。

sentences.english: Males also sported two horns growing from the top of their skulls.
sentences.chinese: 男性查格里亞人還擁有兩隻從其頭部長出的角。

sentences.english: I think we are still living in a male-dominated society.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲現今社會依然以男性爲主導。

sentences.english: Because, slowly but surely, you are doing your gender a disservice.
sentences.chinese: 因爲慢慢你會發現你無疑在給你的男性魅力幫倒忙。

sentences.english: He was motivated by the hope of fathering a male heir to the Tudor Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 他這樣做是爲了都鐸王朝能有一名男性繼承人。

sentences.english: For men, the most-ordered item is burgers, followed by french fries and pizza.
sentences.chinese: 男性點的最多的是漢堡，其次是薯條和比薩餅。

sentences.english: To me masculinity is all my perception, and I think masculinity and feminity is very old-fashioned.
sentences.chinese: 但我認爲探討男性化還是女性化已經過時了。

sentences.english: These effects of excess androgens are called virilization and occur rarely.
sentences.chinese: 這些過多雄激素的影響即罕見的女性男性化。

sentences.english: BEFORE the advent of male vanity, the local barbershop used to be a regaling hotspot.
sentences.chinese: 由於男性的虛榮心，當地的理髮館一直以來生意興隆。

sentences.english: Dwarven women are sturdy and nearly as tough as their men folk.
sentences.chinese: 矮人女子幾乎和他們的男性一樣強壯。

sentences.english: Objective To research on the possible mechanism of male macula retinae.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討男性黃褐斑發病的可能機理。

sentences.english: Males should be coached to understand that.
sentences.chinese: 男性需要被教育去理解這些。

sentences.english: Hai Yan is a male novelist who has a strong consciousness towards the female.
sentences.chinese: 海巖是新時期女性意識十分自覺的男性作家之一。

sentences.english: ISH is more prent among women than men in both races.
sentences.chinese: 在這兩個種族中，女性的ISH患病率高於男性。
